member.name: M:PSoC.ManagementService.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:PSoC.ManagementService.Responses.DataTablesResponse`1
member.summary: Represents the required data for a response from a request by DataTables.

member.name: P:PSoC.ManagementService.Responses.DataTablesResponse`1.iTotalRecords
member.summary: Sets the Total records, before filtering (i.e. the total number of records in the database)

member.name: P:PSoC.ManagementService.Responses.DataTablesResponse`1.iTotalDisplayRecords
member.summary: Sets the Total records, after filtering (i.e. the total number of records after filtering has been applied - not just the number of records being returned in this result set)

member.name: P:PSoC.ManagementService.Responses.DataTablesResponse`1.sEcho
member.summary: Sets an unaltered copy of sEcho sent from the client side. This parameter will change with each draw (it is basically a draw count) - so it is important that this is implemented. Note that it strongly recommended for security reasons that you 'cast' this parameter to an integer in order to prevent Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

member.name: P:PSoC.ManagementService.Responses.DataTablesResponse`1.aaData
member.summary: Sets the data in a 2D array (Array of JSON objects). Note that you can change the name of this parameter with sAjaxDataProp.
